articles.description: England qualify for Euro 2024 knockout stages following Albania's defeat to Spain and Italy seal progress with late goal against Croatia - reaction.
articles.title: Euro 2024 latest: England into last 16 and Italy beat Croatia to seal progress

articles.description: Afghanistan qualify for the semi-finals of a World Cup for the first time in their history after beating Bangladesh in a low-scoring classic in St Vincent.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Afghanistan reach semi-final for first time

articles.description: Croatia's late heartache against Italy likely leaves them heading out of Euro 2024 and with uncertainty over the international future of their captain Luka Modric.
articles.title: Croatia 1-1 Itay: Cruel blow leaves Modric's future uncertain

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Brazil vs Costa Rica in the CONMEBOL Copa America
articles.title: Brazil vs Costa Rica: CONMEBOL Copa America - BBC Sport

articles.description: It is time for England to show why they were the pre-tournament favourites at Euro 2024, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Euro 2024 - England face Slovenia with points to prove

articles.description: Slovenia striker Benjamin Sesko has the hopes of nation on his shoulderS as bids to down England at Euro 2024 on Tuesday.
articles.title: Euro 2024: England v Slovenia - Benjamin Sesko will be threat to Three Lions

articles.description: David Warner's international cricket career is now over after Australia were eliminated from the T20 World Cup.
articles.title: David Warner: Australia opener's international career over after Afghanistan reach T20 World Cup semi-finals

articles.description: Reigning women's Olympic 800m champion Athing Mu will not defend her title at the 2024 Games after falling in the US Olympic trials.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: 800m champion Athing Mu fails to qualify

articles.description: Spain get the better of Albania as an early goal from Ferran Torres in Dusseldorf extends their 100% record at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Albania 0-1 Spain: Ferran Torres goal secures Euro 2024 100% group record

articles.description: The Florida Panthers beat the Edmonton Oilers to win the Stanley Cup for the first time in their franchise history.
articles.title: Stanley Cup: Florida Panthers beat Edmonton Oilers to claim first title
